chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para: To use the CDI Query module, you need to put the API and implementation JARs on the classpath of your enterprise application.

Substitute the expression ${cdi.query.version} with the most recent or appropriate version of the CDI Query module. Alternatively, you can create a Maven user-defined property
